actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide that the Federal share of rail service continuation subsidy shall be 90 percent and the State share shall be 10 percent.

summary.text: Provides that the Federal share of a rail service continuation subsidy under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act shall be 90 percent and the State share shall be 10 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to provide that the Federal share of rail service continuation subsidy shall be 90 percent and the State share shall be 10 percent.
